class_notes:
Law and Legal Professionals provides legal professionals an anthropological and sociological survey of the legal profession, including the institutional, cultural, psycho-social, and ethical influences that shape legal practice and the role of lawyers and others in the practice of law.
JM  Students only.  Per ABA rules, JD and LLM students will receive credit for JM courses
course_description: Law and Legal Professionals provides legal professionals an anthropological and sociological survey of the legal profession, including the institutional, cultural, psycho-social, and ethical influences that shape legal practice and the role of lawyers and others in the practice of law.
